long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hide messages, images, account profile on WhatsApp screen until you hover over them.

The main purpose of this extension is to enhance privacy protection when using WhatsApp Web in public spaces. It automatically blurs your messages and other content, which will only be revealed when you hover your mouse cursor over them. This prevents others from peeking at your messages.

Main Features
● Screen lock: The Lock Screen feature requires a password to access WhatsApp Web. Protect your privacy when you leave your computer.
● Message Blur: Automatically blurs your messages and other content (such as images, videos, etc.).
● Hover-to-Reveal: Content becomes clear when you hover your mouse cursor over the blurred content.
● Customizable Blurring: You can choose which elements to blur according to your needs. For example, you can choose to blur only message content, or also include contact information and chat lists.


How to hide messages? You can toggle different settings on the WhatsApp privacy extension to meet your personal needs.


Features
● Enable Screen Lock: Blur the entire screen; no information can be viewed without entering a password.
● All Messages in Chat: Blur all messages in the current chat.
● Latest Message Preview: Blur all message previews on the left side.
● Image and docs Preview: Blur all images, videos, stickers, etc., that are separated from the text.
● Image and docs Library: Blur all thumbnails of images, videos, etc., when viewing them.
● Text Input: Lighten the color of the input field to make it difficult to read.
● Profile Pictures: Blur all profile pictures.
● Group/User Names: Blur all group and user names.
● No Transition Delay: Allows you to disable the delay before items are shown on hover.
● Unblur on App Hover: Unblur all elements when you hover over the WhatsApp Web application.


If you like Privacy Protector Plus for WA, show us more love with a nice review. It really helps.

WhatsApp is a trademark of WhatsApp Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. WADesk is an independent project and has no relationship to WhatsApp or WhatsApp Inc.

long.zh_CN,zh_TW:
在WhatsApp屏幕上隐藏消息、图片和账户信息，直到你将鼠标悬停在它们上面。

这个扩展的主要目的是增强在公共场所使用WhatsApp Web时的隐私保护。它会自动模糊你的消息和其他内容，只有当你将鼠标光标悬停在这些内容上时，内容才会显示出来，从而防止他人窥视你的消息。

主要功能
● 屏幕锁定：锁定屏幕功能需要密码才能访问 WhatsApp Web。离开电脑时保护您的隐私。
● 消息模糊：自动模糊你的消息和其他内容（如图片、视频等）。
● 鼠标悬停显示：当你将鼠标光标悬停在模糊内容上时，内容会变得清晰可见。
● 自定义模糊元素：你可以根据个人需求选择要模糊处理的元素。例如，你可以选择只模糊消息内容，或者包括联系人信息和聊天列表。

如何隐藏消息？
你可以在WhatsApp隐私扩展上切换不同设置，以满足你的个人需求。

功能
● 启用锁屏：模糊整个屏幕，不输入密码无法浏览任何信息。
● 聊天中的所有消息：模糊当前聊天中的所有消息。
● 最新消息预览：模糊左侧的所有消息预览。
● 媒体预览：模糊与文本分离的所有图像、视频、贴纸等。
● 媒体库：在查看图像、视频时模糊图像、视频等的所有小图标……
● 文本输入：使输入字段中的颜色变浅，使其难以阅读。
● 头像：模糊所有个人资料图片。
● 群组/用户名称：模糊所有组和用户名。
● 无过渡延迟：允许您关闭在悬停时显示项目之前的延迟。
● 在应用悬停时取消模糊：当您将鼠标悬停在 WhatsApp Web 应用程序上时，取消模糊所有元素。

如果你喜欢Privacy Protector Plus for WA，请给我们一个好评。这对我们真的很有帮助。

WhatsApp是WhatsApp Inc.在美国和其他国家注册的商标。WADesk是一个独立项目，与WhatsApp或WhatsApp Inc.没有关系。
